DOC.brief_summary: Blood sample is taken for measurement of serum creatinine, cystatin C, clone V haemoglobin, cholesterol, urine acid, glycemia and CRP. The medical file is gathered. There will be searched for an association between renal function and cardiovascular risk factors and risk factors by exposition to toxic substantia during work.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Renal Failure and Risk Factors in an Unreferred Healthy Population
